Dated: - 16/12/2022

AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.05/2022

Subject: Categorization of airports

In exercise of powers conferred by Sub Section (1A) of Section 5A
of the Aircraft Act, 1934 (XXII of 1934), read with rule 3 (b) of the Aircraft
(Security) Rules, 2011, the Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation
Security (DG, BCAS), for the purpose of the safety of passengers, crew,
ground personnel and the general public in all matters related to
safeguarding against acts of unlawful interference with civil aviation, directs
that the threat and risk assessment at airports in the country has been
reviewed in consultation with the Central Security Agencies. The revised

categorization into Normal, Sensitive and Hypersensitive airports is as
under:
